Deﬁnition 5.7 (Multivariate Taylor Series). We consider a function
f : RD →R (5.149)
x↦→f(x) , x∈RD, (5.150)
that is smooth at x0. When we deﬁne the difference vector δ:= x−x0,
the multivariate Taylor series of f at (x0) is deﬁned asmultivariate Taylor
series
f(x) =
∞∑
k=0
Dk
xf(x0)
k! δk, (5.151)
where Dk
xf(x0) is the k-th (total) derivative of f with respect to x, eval-
uated at x0.
